name: Youtube Watched Overlay
description:
A simple, customisable "Watched" overlay to go over thumbnails on Youtube so you can quickly see if you've watched them already.

Originally part of my style 130610 theme, now an optional extra with a few basic settings.

discussions.name: This broke today, YT may have changed something, please update

style_setting_options.label: Dark
Light

style_settings.label: Hide or show when you hover

style_setting_options.label: Hide when you hover
Show when you hover
